overview:
Mr. Klante joined Hyperformix in 2006 with over twenty years of marketing, technology, and executive leadership experience in enterprise software with organizations such as Lotus/IBM, Cognos, and Vignette. Mr. Klante has played a key role in the creation and realization of significant shareholder value in multiple early-stage organizations.

Mr. Klante served most recently as President and CEO of Resolution EBS, an Austin-based business rules engine software company. Prior to Resolution EBS, Klante was Senior Vice President and General Manager of the Gateway Business Unit for 724 Solutions. Klante also served as the Vice President of Marketing for Vignette, where he was instrumental in the company’s rapid growth and positioning for Vignette’s $1B IPO. Prior to Vignette, Klante held senior marketing positions at Fulcrum Technologies, Lotus Development, and Cognos.

Mr. Klante holds a Bachelor of Mathematics, with a focus on Computer Science and Business Administration from the University of Waterloo.
